title: His to Hold
description: I was in the middle of the biggest merger of my career when my love life took a nosedive. My now ex-girlfriend wouldn’t leave my apartment, so I moved into my office, only to be caught by my brothers one morning after I’d gone on a bender. Angry and bothered that I’d violated company policies more than once I was put on a two-week forced vacation effective immediately. One week into what was supposed to be peaceful solitude to get my life back on tract, I decided to cut my trip short and return to work. Instead, I end up stranded at the airport during the worst snowstorm of the year. That was when I saw her. Mia, my best friend’s sister, all grown up and intoxicatingly beautiful. It had been twenty years since we’d laid eyes on each other, yet the chemistry still crackles between us. Soon, one thing leads to another and we find ourselves riding out the storm in the most enticing way, tangled in bed sheets. The girl who held my attention all those years ago, now holds my heart. But when we are forced to go head-to-head in the boardroom will our second chance be over before it even begins. Fans of steamy office romance, with a friends-to-lovers twist, will be gripping the copy machine and swooning over His to Hold by USA Today Best Selling Author, S.L. Sterling
author: S.L. Sterling
